items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: A lightweight, multi-tier online bookstore with Node.js RESTful microservices for catalog and order handling, supported by a MySQL database. Features search by topic, book info retrieval, and purchasing capabilities, with distributed deployment and concurrent request management across separate services.

Features search by topic, book info retrieval, and purchasing capabilities, with distributed deployment and concurrent request management across separate services.
